name: synchronize_txt_with_story_graph
description: Review text story map and infer changes to story graph JSON. AI reads text, identifies differences, and proposes updates to story-graph.json with report.
instructions: 1. User provides story-map.txt (text format story map)
2. AI reads both story-map.txt and story-graph.json
3. AI compares text with JSON structure, identifying:
- New stories, epics, or sub-epics in text
- Removed items (in JSON but not in text)
- Changed user assignments, connectors, or sequential order
- Changed story group types or connectors
- New, update, remove increments and story assignment to increments
4. AI generates a report showing all differences
5. AI proposes specific changes to story-graph.json
**TEXT FORMAT:** See templates/story-map-template.txt for format rules
